title: Sitapur rape victim and family lock themselves in house on alleged life threat
content:
Source: News unlimited - 4 days ago 
Two years after jail sentence, rape accused kills victim in Sitapur  02:07 Sitapur, Sep 13 (ANI): An alleged rape accused shot dead a 22-year-old woman who had lodged the case against him two years ago. The incident took place in Maholi police station area in Sitapur district of Uttar Pradesh when the woman was going to her home with her husband on bicycle. The woman had...
